entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make the pwsh dotnet installer script run on mac/linux #21284
  • With .NET 6.0 RC2(6.0.100-rc.2.21469.5) SDK, I can't install Blazor WebAssembly AOT workload. #21261
  • `dotnet workload install macos` installs the world #21251

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1379278 #21289
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add rollback option to install command and allow missing manifest ids #21283
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1379080 #21281
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1378946 #21278
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the documentation to include Zip Deploy #21272
    Area-WebSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1377698 #21264
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1377506 #21262
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1377453 #21260
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1377423 #21259
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1377304 #21253
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix up some test packages #21252
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1377055 #21249
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1379448 #21291
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix incremental in RunProduceContentAssets target. #19229
  • Use a BlockingCollection in the logger to reduce CPU usage #21085
    Area-Install
  • Update ValidateExecutableReferences with new schema #19786
    Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx-rc2' => 'main' #21192
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Always reference .NET Framework reference assembly packages if using static GraphWithoutRuntimeDependencies #21236
    Area-External
